content.legion: Grants flat STR, DEX, and LUK

pros: Great mobility with double flash jump and up jump with Quicksilver: Takeoff and Diagonal Chase
Ability to fly from is useful for bossing with Liberty Boosters
Great mobbing with lots of summons and homing missiles
Strong burst from 5th job skill Omega Blaster plus you are invincible
Has an iFrame from Orbital Cataclysm
Has a bind from Entangling Lash
cons: Extremely punishing if you die while charging 5th job skill Omega Blaster

baseStats: Excludes attack specfic bonuses, Hyper Skill passives, OOParts Code, and buffs with long cooldowns
All Stats: [ up to +10%] [ up to +20%]
Knockback Resistance: [ +40%] [ +50%]

info: To create one, choose the 'Xenon' option in the Character Creation screen. Xenons have their own separate creation button like Demons. As well, they have a different story than regular Resistance but are part of the same class group

build: -> -> -> ->

details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Beam Dance - Reinforce and Blur
  • Mecha Purge - Reinforce and Guardbreak
  • Hypogram Field - Persist

extraContent.title: Xenon Mechanics
extraContent.content:
Xenon is a hybrid class, they are able to equip both Thief and Pirate equipment. As well, they benefit the most from %All Stat and require a good balance of all stats to get the most range. As well, Xenon's Emblem is called a Power Source which is bought from his home base

Xenon also has a secondary resource called Supply Surplus which will give you increased stats as the gauge fills up. Additionally, some of Xenon's skills will consume the Supply Surplus

As well, Xenon can have multiple attack variations that you can switch between using Modal Shift

primary.name: Supply Surplus
primary.shortDesc: Recharges one power unit every 4 sec, and grants a 60% chance to recharge one unit on hit/evade. +1% all stats per extra power unit.

primary.name: Multilateral I
primary.shortDesc:
[At 20+ STR] 3% for Knockback Resistance
[At 20+ DEX] 3% for Elemental Resistance, 3 for Abnormal Status Resistance
[At 20+ LUK] 3% Avoidability
[At 20+ STR, DEX, and LUK] 3% Damage
primary.desc: Grants special bonuses once you've reached a certain amount of stats

primary.name: Promessa Escape
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30. Summons the Promessa to return you to base.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Modal Shift
primary.shortDesc: Use this skill simultaneously with another skill to activate its alternate modes. Reactivate this skill to revert back.
primary.desc: Allows you to switch between different attacks
details: Pressing this repeatedly Skill Key will switch between your 2nd, 3rd, and 4th Job skill options

primary.name: Liberty Boosters
primary.shortDesc: Activate the booster to fly for 30 sec. Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: While active, you will be able to fly for a short duration
details: Only buffs can be used while in the air

primary.name: Mimic Protocol
primary.shortDesc: Lets you ignore equipment stat requirements. Also lets you equip Pirate and Thief equipment.

primary.name: Beam Spline
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 9, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Swing your whip blade forward twice

primary.name: Propulsion Burst
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10. Adds an extra jump when used in midair. Can be used 2 times back to back.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Circuit Surge
primary.shortDesc: [Supply]\nEnergy Cost: 3, Weapon ATT: +30, Duration: 240 sec

primary.name: Radial Nerve
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +40, Max Speed: +20, Jump: +10

primary.name: Multilateral II
primary.shortDesc:
[At 40+ STR] Knockback Resistance 5%
[At 40+ DEX] Elemental Resistance 5%, Abnormal Status Resistance 5
[At 40+ LUK] Avoidability +5%
[At 40+ STR, DEX, and LUK] Damage +5%, Max HP & MP +5%
primary.desc: Grants special bonuses once you've reached a certain amount of stats

primary.name: Pinpoint Salvo
primary.shortDesc: Damage to enemies in range: 50%, Number of Missiles: 4. Damage Against Normal Enemies: +150%\nCooldown: 2 sec.
primary.desc: When toggled, whenever you attack, you will fire missiles at nearby enemies
details: Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Quicksilver: Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Damage: 145%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slashes your whip blade several times in front of you

primary.name: Quicksilver: Concentrate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 240%, Number of Attacks: 2, Critical Rate: +30%
primary.desc: Swings you whip blade forward
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate

primary.name: Quicksilver: Takeoff
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Damage: 155%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Lashes your whip blade while boosting you up into the air

primary.name: Ion Thrust
primary.shortDesc: [Supply ]\nEnergy Cost: 3, MP Cost per attack: 6, Max Enemies: 6 Damage: 60%, Knocks back enemies. Duration: 8. Energy is consumed only when the Ion Thrust is summoned.
primary.desc: Hop onto an Ion Thruster which will damage and push enemies back

primary.name: Efficiency Streamline
primary.shortDesc: Max HP/MP: +30%

primary.name: Perspective Shift
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +40%

primary.name: Xenon Booster
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2\nMax HP/MP: +1000

primary.name: Structural Integrity
primary.shortDesc: All Stats: +25

primary.name: Xenon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Mastery: +50%, Attack Power +20

primary.name: Multilateral III
primary.shortDesc:
[At 90+ STR] Knockback Resistance +7%
[At 90+ DEX] Elemental Resistance +7%, Abnormal Status Resistance +7
[At 90+ LUK] Avoidability +7%
[At 90+ STR, DEX, and LUK] Damage +7%, Max HP/MP +5%
primary.desc: Grants special bonuses once you've reached a certain amount of stats

primary.name: Pinpoint Salvo Redesign A
primary.shortDesc: Pinpoint Salvo Damage: +40% points.
details: Increases %p Damage of attack

primary.name: Combat Switch: Explosion
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Thrusts your whip nlade forward which will then explode

primary.name: Combat Switch: Air Whip
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 270%, Number of Attacks: 2, Additional damage on airborne enemies: 190%
primary.desc: Swings your whip blade forward
details: Deals increased %Damage to enemies in the air

primary.name: Combat Switch: Fission
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 271%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Splits your whip blade to damage enemies below you
details: Can only be used in the air
Can be combined with Diagonal Chase

primary.name: Diagonal Chase
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 260% to knock back enemies.
primary.desc: Dashes diagonally while pushing back enemies
details: Can be used during Gravity Pillar

primary.name: Gravity Pillar
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 301%, Number of Attacks: 1, Launches enemies into the air.
primary.desc: Creates a zone from below that lifts enemies into the air

primary.name: Hybrid Defenses
primary.shortDesc: Bonus Avoidability: +45%, Damage Taken: -10%\nAll Stats +10, Defense +400.

primary.name: Aegis System
primary.shortDesc: Chance to fire missiles when hit or evading: 100%, Damage: 120%, Number of Missiles: 3, Cooldown: 1.5 sec.
primary.desc: Whenever you are hit or evade an attack, you have a chance to fire defensive missiles
details: Ignores Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect

primary.name: Triangulation
primary.shortDesc: Chance to attach Airframe on attack: 30%, Max Airframes: 3, Damage when enemy with 3 Airframes is attacked: 340%, Number of Attacks: 3, Enemy Accuracy for each Airframe: - 8%
primary.desc: While attacking, you have a chance to attach 'Airframes'. Once 3 Airframes are attached to an enemy, the stacks will be consumed and will deal damage to that enemy
details: Enemy has decreased %Accuracy and %Avoidability for each Airframe
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Manifest Projector
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Creates a clone hologram. Projection makes an additional hit that is 70% of Final Damage. Projection disappears after losing 1000% of your Max HP.
primary.desc: Creates a clone hologram that mimics your attacks, increasing the number of hits you deal per attack
details: The clone only disappears after losing a proportion of your %Max HP
Clone's attacks deal reduced %Final Damage
Does not mimic , , summoning skills and 5th Job Common Skills

primary.name: Multilateral IV
primary.shortDesc:
[At 150+ STR] Knockback Resistance +10%
[At 150+ DEX] Elemental Resistance +10%, Abnormal Status Resistance +10
[At 150+ LUK] Avoidability +10%
[At 150+ STR, DEX, and LUK] Damage +10%, Max HP/MP +10%
primary.desc: Grants special bonuses once you've reached a certain amount of stats

primary.name: Emergency Resupply
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Extra power unit charged: 10. Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Instantly grants extra charges of Energy

primary.name: Pinpoint Salvo Redesign B
primary.shortDesc: Pinpoint Salvo Damage: +40% points. Stacks with 1st enhancement.
details: Increases %p Damage provided

primary.name: Beam Dance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 9, Damage: 260%, Number of Attacks: 1, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Violently swings your Whip Blade around yourself
details: You can move and jump while attacking

primary.name: Mecha Purge: Snipe
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Damage: 345%, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Number of Attacks: 7, Enemy DEF Ignored: 30%
primary.desc: Deals a focused attack towards a single enemy with the highest HP
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Mecha Purge: Bombard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Damage: 344%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Blasts a laser forward damaging multiple enemies

primary.name: Mecha Purge: Bombardment
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Damage: 398%, Number of Attacks: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 15
primary.desc: Bombards enemies from the air with missiles and lasers

primary.name: Hypogram Field: Penetrate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 31, Hypogram Field Duration: 20, Damage on contact: 213%\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Creates a zone where a bouncing orb will damage any enemy it comes in contact with
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Hypogram Field: Force Field
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 31, Duration of hypogram field: 20, Max enemies hit when ball touches field: 8, Damage: 400%, Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Creates a zone where enemies are damaged each time a bouncing orb touches the force field
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Hypogram Field: Support
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 31, Duration of hypogram field: 20, Ally Max HP Boost: 10%, Power units recharged when allies evade: +1.\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Creates a zone where any party members within it will have increased %Max HP, %Avoidability
details: Whenever party members dodge an attack, you will gain 1 Energy

primary.name: OOPArts Code
primary.shortDesc: [Supply]\nEnergy Cost: 20, Duration: 40, Final Damage: +30%, Boss Damage: +30%

primary.name: Instant Shock
primary.shortDesc: Additional evasion chance: 40%, Aegis System Missile Damage: +20%
primary.desc: Grants a dodge chance and enhances the %Damage of

primary.name: Xenon Expert
primary.shortDesc: Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +8%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Temporal Pod
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration of party cooldown reduction effect: 60. Cooldown: 120 sec
primary.desc: When activated, you reduce the skill cooldowns of nearby party members
details: The pod is destroyed when you are hit
Has no effect on skills that are not affected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Offensive Matrix
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: 50%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +30%

primary.name: Multilateral V
primary.shortDesc:
[At 260+ STR] Knockback Resistance +10%
[At 260+ DEX] Elemental Resistance +10%, Abnormal Status Resistance +10
[At 260+ LUK] Avoidability +10%
[At 260+ STR, DEX, and LUK] Damage +10%, Max HP/MP +10%
primary.desc: Grants special bonuses once you've reached a certain amount of stats

primary.name: Pinpoint Salvo Perfect Design
primary.shortDesc: Pinpoint Salvo Damage: +100% points. Stacks with 1st and 2nd enhancement.
details: Increases %p Damage provided

primary.name: Multilateral VI
primary.shortDesc:
[At 330+ STR] 5% for Knockback Resistance
[At 330+ DEX] 5% for Elemental Resistance, 5 for Abnormal Status Resistance
[At 330+ LUK]: 5% Avoidability
[At 330+ STR, DEX, and LUK] +5% Damage
primary.desc: Grants special bonuses once you've reached a certain amount of stats

hyperPassive.name: Mecha Purge - Spread
hyperPassive.desc: Increases the maximum number of enemies hit by

hyperActive.name: Amaranth Generator
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Gauge Charge: Max, Charge duration: 10 sec\nCooldown: 90 sec
hyperActive.desc: While active, skills that will not consume your Supply Surplus and your gauge will gain max charge

hyperActive.name: Entangling Lash
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 4, Chance to Debuff: 100%, Bind Duration: 10 sec.\nBind Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Entangling Lash.\nCooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: Lashes your Whip Blade forward, binding enemies hit

hyperActive.name: Orbital Cataclysm
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1500%, Number of Attacks: 6, DEF: -30% for 10 sec. Invincible while casting.\nAfter casting, increases damage by 10% for 25 sec\nCooldown: 50 sec
hyperActive.desc: Fires a powerful laser cannon that deals a devastating attack and grants a %Damage buff

fifthMain.name: Omega Blaster
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 525%, Number of Attacks: 6, Duration: 6 sec, Invincible while attacking
Hold down skill key to charge for up to 90 sec. Duration increases by 1 sec for every 3 sec charged (up to 5 sec max). If you exceed the max charge time, the charge will be canceled.
Press the skill key again while attacking to cancel immediately.
Cooldown: 165 sec., starting after the attack begins.
fifthMain.desc: Charges and releases a powerful laser beam
details: Holding down the Skill Key before releasing will increase the duration of the skill
Pressing the Skill Key again while firing will cancel the attack early
You are invincible while firing the laser

fifthMain.name: Core Overload
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 250, When MP skill is cast, consumes 1% Max MP + 180 per sec. Allows you to charge 20 additional Surplus Energy. Energy charging time halved.
Final Damage increases by 1% per Surplus Energy charged.
Use skill again to deactivate it. Extra Surplus Energy disappears immediately on skill deactivation.
Generates plasma currents at random intervals that activate electricity 4 times striking up to 12 enemies for 355% damage 6 times.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: When used, increases your maximum storage capacity
details: While active, gain increased %Final Damage for each Energy unit and halved Energy charging time
While active, periodically you will produce plasma that damages nearby enemies
Pressing the Skill Key again will end the skill early
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Hypogram Field: Fusion
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP cost: 1000, Hologram Field generated for 30 sec.
Whenever the orb makes contact with the Hologram Field, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 5. The same amount of damage is inflicted when the orb touches monsters.
Damage inflicted by party members within the field is increased by 17%, 1 surplus energy recharged whenever a party member within the field evades an attack.
Missiles fired by the Aegis System increased by 7 when Xenon is inside the field.
Cooldown: 100 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a force field that has the combined effects of all 3 Hypogram Fields
details: You also fire extra missiles while inside the force field

Increases %Damage of party members inside the field
  • Recharges 1 Energy whenever a party member attacks within the field evades an attack
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Photon Ray
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 150, aim mode activates for 20 sec, additional 350 MP consumed upon firing.
Initial shots are 3 blast each. Can take up to 15 additional shots are 15 shots.
Photonic cannon attacks 3 times with 700% damage per shot.
Cooldown: 35 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Summons a photon cannon that slowly aims and targets enemies before releasing homing missiles at targeted enemies
details:
On initial cast, enemies one by one will be aimed at before becoming a target
  • Moving too far away from enemies that are being aimed at will cancel the targetting
  • Targetting starts off fast and eventually slows down
    • Attacking enemies that are being aimed at will complete the targetting faster

Pressing the Skill Key again will fire the photon cannon
  • If it is not pressed before the aiming phase ends, the photon cannon will not fire
Photon cannon will prioritize bosses and enemies with the highest max HP
Can be used during , , and without any casting delay
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and

meta: Xenon is an STR, DEX, and LUK hybrid Thief and Pirate class part of the Resistance class group. Since Xenon is a hybrid class, they are able to equip both Thief and Pirate equipment. As well, they benefit the most from %All Stat and require a good balance of all stats to get the most range
